head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths NEALE, MARY CECELIA

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths NEALE, MARY CECELIA

block.p: NEALE-Mary Cecelia. Born to Eternal Life, Oct. 28, 1998. Beloved sister of Teresa Misklow and the late J. Hamilton Neale, F. Brent Neale, and Catherine Brent Neale Hill. Devoted aunt of Richard Hill, Mary Lucille Hill-Monaco, Patricia and James Neale, Mary Burke and Phillip Misklow. Visitation 6-9 PM Friday October 30, John Krtil Funeral Home, 1297 First Avenue. A Mass of Christian Burial will be celebrated at the Church of the Holy Family, 315 47 St., 10:30 AM, Saturday, October 31. Interment is at 1 P.M., Monday, November 2nd, at the New Cathedral Cemetery, Baltimore, Maryland.
